ProcessTemplates.Name: MongoDB to JSON file - Export data
ProcessTemplates.Description: This template retrieves data from a MongoDB collection and exports it to a local fileshare as a single JSON file.
ProcessTemplates.ProcessVariablesJson: {"ConnectionString":{"Value":"\"mongodb://foo:bar@localhost:00000/?authSource=admin\"","IsSecret":true,"Mode":"text","Description":"The connection string for accessing the MongoDB instance."},"Database":{"Value":"\"exampleDatabase\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"The name of the MongoDB database."},"Collection":{"Value":"\"exampleCollection\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"The name of the MongoDB collection where the file data will be inserted."},"TargetFilePath":{"Value":"\"/example_directory/example_filename.json\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"The full path of the created JSON file, including the file name."}}
